# Check Datasets

```{r}
repos <- read.csv("./data/repositories.csv")
str(repos)

crashes <- read.csv("./data/Airplane_Crashes_and_Fatalities_Since_1908.csv")
str(crashes)

spotify <- read.csv("./data/final.csv")
str(spotify)
summary(spotify)

spotify_sa <- spotify %>% 
  filter(country == "South Africa")
spotify_sample <- spotify %>% 
  sample_n(50)
write.csv(spotify_sample, "sample.csv", row.names=FALSE)
write.csv(spotify_sa, "./data/spotify-sa.csv", row.names=FALSE)

spotify_json <- toJSON()
write(spotify_json, "./data/spotify.json")

msl <- read.csv("./data/msl_csv2/all_matches.csv")
str(msl)

sa20 <- read.csv("./data/sat_csv2/all_matches.csv")
str(sa20)
```
